p:
The temporal distribution of the A(H1N1)pdm09 virus during the season 2013 showed an extended period of circulation in Yucatan, with the highest frequency of circulation from June until September. The mutation A141T was detected in June in 25% (4 out of 16) of the A(H1N1)pdm09 viruses analysed, whereas the change S162I was detected in August (25%; 4 out of 16) and September (21%; 3 out of 14); co-circulation of viruses containing one or another genetic change occurred during the month of July (6 viruses with HA -A141T and 6 viruses with HA -S162I) (
S1 Table and Fig 3 ).
